about.title: About Duong Spa
about.paragraph1: Duong Spa specializes in deep therapeutic massage services, helping reduce fatigue, joint pain, and comprehensive health recovery.
about.paragraph2: With an experienced team of therapists, we are committed to providing excellent relaxation experiences and the highest therapeutic effectiveness for our customers.

services.title: Featured Services
services.service1Desc: Specialized in treating musculoskeletal pain, acupressure, muscle stretching
services.service2Desc: Acupoint stimulation, blood circulation, reducing insomnia and stress
services.service3Desc: Deep tissue, releases muscle stiffness, suitable for athletes
services.service4Desc: Comprehensive relaxation, improves sleep, reduces tension
services.service5Desc: Addresses hand numbness, headaches, shoulder pain - for office workers
services.service6Desc: Reduces swelling, improves circulation, suitable for people who stand/walk a lot
